title: fix: update z-image SPAN model path and vastai docs
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Scaling up the hive
gist.blurb: We've optimized our upscaling models and added fresh GPUs to the cluster. Image generation queues have dropped from over 20 down to zero!
gist.summary: Switched z-image to efficient safetensors models and expanded Vast.ai GPU capacity to eliminate generation queues.
gist.impact: Users will see immediate reductions in wait times for image generation.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot in a cozy server room, connecting a new glowing server rack. Represents adding capacity and speed. Warm lighting, tech vibes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot plugging a glowing lime green cable into a retro server rack. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel mint gradient background. Chunky sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi server room vibes. Text in pixel font: 'POWER UP'. Nostalgic, efficient, and cute.
